description: The Talus AT (All-Terrain) combines durability and uncompromised grip that has made it a fan favorite by those that like to hike. Leather construction stands up to the tests that you'll put it through on your outdoor adventures, and a soft, but supportive midsole allows easy break-in. The upper is backed with a waterproof Vasque membrane for a full waterproof seal that will keep your feet dry, not matter how wet the ground gets. The Talus AT is the perfect boot if you're looking to log miles outside. Its performance will allow you to shift your attention to the horizon and not where your next step will be.
name: Vasque Talus AT UltraDry, Medium - Mens
